build system from https://code.qt.io/cgit/qt/qtbase.git/tree/cmake/QtPublicSbomHelpers.cmake

software do apply.

packages.name: MSVC
packages.summary: The compiler as identified by CMake, running on Windows (AMD64)

packages.comment:
Built by CMake 3.30.5 with RelWithDebInfo;Debug configuration for Windows (AMD64)
qtshadertools was configured with:
    qt-configure-module <sources>/qtshadertools -- -DFFMPEG_DIR=C:\FFmpeg-n7.1\build\msvc\installed -DQT_DEPLOY_FFMPEG=TRUE -DFEATURE_clangcpp=OFF -DINPUT_headersclean=ON -DQT_INSTALL_CONFIG_INFO_FILES=ON -DQT_GENERATE_SBOM=ON -DQT_GENERATE_SOURCE_SBOM=ON -DQT_SBOM_PYTHON_INTERP=C:\Python38_64 -DQT_SBOM_PYTHON_APPS_PATH=C:\Python310_64\Scripts -DQT_LINT_SOURCE_SBOM=ON -DQT_INTERNAL_SBOM_DEFAULT_CHECKS=ON -DQT_INTERNAL_SBOM_AUDIT=ON -DQT_INTERNAL_SBOM_AUDIT_NO_ERROR=ON -DQT_BUILD_TESTS=OFF -DCMAKE_AUTOGEN_VERBOSE=ON -DCMAKE_MESSAGE_LOG_LEVEL=STATUS -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER=sccache -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER=sccache
packages.copyrightText: Copyright (C) The Qt Company Ltd. and other contributors.
packages.name: qtshadertools

packages.comment:
CMake target name: BundledSpirv_Cross
CMake exported target name: Qt6::BundledSpirv_Cross
Contained in CMake package: Qt6BundledSpirv_Cross
    Information extracted from:
     /src_dir/qtshadertools/src/3rdparty/SPIRV-Cross/qt_attribution.json
    Entry index: 0
    Id: spirvcross
    Name: SPIRV-Cross
    Description: A practical tool and library for performing reflection on SPIR-V and disassembling SPIR-V back to high level languages.
    Qt usage: Shader code generation.
    License: Apache License 2.0 and MIT Khronos - old variant
